channel.title: Omfg if you know your java read this!
channel.description:
The max money is declaired in an int right??? ints max value being 2.147 billion what if we changed it to a long!!!
[quote="Definition of a long from Java Tutorials."]long: The long data type is a 64-bit signed two's complement integer. It has a minimum value of -9,223,372,036,854,775,808 and a maximum value of 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 (inclusive). Use this data type when you need a range of values wider than those provided by int.[/quote]
So the max money could be trillions!!! :eek:
